attributes.long-description:
In a world where mythology and technology are one, a young rebel and his ragtag crew of friends are unwittingly drawn into a holy war being waged by the bloodthirsty General Faulkner and his mercenary forces. Guide the charismatic Bastion as he realizes his destiny to lead the rebellion against the Junaris Kingdom, and to save the people of his world from an eternity of oppression.

Vanguard Bandits puts you in command of powerful squadrons of magical robotic warriors in defiance of the evil Junaris Kingdom. Use the terrain to your advantage and maneuver your forces into superior combat positions. Witness the results of your tactical decisions in glorious 3D combat sequences. With almost 60 missions and 5 unique endings, your social life will evaporate, and the best part is you won't care! Bonus: Strategy guide available at www.monkeypawgames.com

Transferring to a PSP® system from your PS3™ system:

You must be signed into the PlayStation®Network account that originally purchased the game. You must have at least 386 MB free on your Memory Stick Duo™. Connect your PSP® system to your PS3™ system with a USB cable and switch your PSP® system to USB Mode. Highlight the game on the PS3™ XMB™, press the Δ button and select Copy.

PC Store Customers:
Log into your PlayStation®Network account that you originally used to purchased the game. Then, download the game from your "Download List" in the PlayStation®Store onto your PS3™ system.

This title has been converted from the original PlayStation® disc to the PSP® and the PS3™ systems. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation® disc version, or where some features may not function properly. This version does not support PlayStation® peripherals (controller, memory card, multitap, etc.), therefore functionalities such as multiplayer, versus, and co-op modes are not available.

© HUMAN 1998; English Translation © 2000 Working Designs

Purchase indicates acceptance of the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all of these terms, do not purchase this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Vanguard Bandits (PSOne Classic)
